title: Taiwan Hosts Second U.S. Congressional Delegation in Two Weeks
sub_head: The visit comes days after the White House invited Taiwan to a meeting of democracies, exacerbating tensions with Beijing
body:
A delegation of mostly Democratic lawmakers arrived in Taiwan for a two-day trip, marking the second Congressional visit in roughly two weeks at a time of rising tension between Beijing and Washington over the democratically self-ruled island.
The five-member delegation landed in Taipei Thursday evening ahead of meetings Friday with senior Taiwanese officials on issues including U.S.-Taiwan relations and regional security, according to statements from Taiwanâ€™s Foreign Ministry and the American Institute in Taiwan, the de facto U.S. embassy on the island.
